name: Pest Trend Analysis
query:
SELECT 
    mv.customer as 'Customer',
    mv.customer_address as 'Premise Address',
    ptd.area_location as 'Area/Location',
    ptd.pest_noticed as 'Pest Noticed',
    SUM(ptd.pest_count) as 'Total Count',
    COUNT(*) as 'Occurrences',
    MAX(ptd.activity_level) as 'Max Activity Level',
    mv.mntc_date as 'Visit Date'
FROM 
    `tabMaintenance Visit` mv
    INNER JOIN `tabPest Trend Detail` ptd ON ptd.parent = mv.name
WHERE 
    mv.docstatus = 1
    AND mv.mntc_date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
    {customer_filter}
    {premise_filter}
GROUP BY 
    mv.customer, mv.customer_address, ptd.area_location, ptd.pest_noticed
ORDER BY 
    ptd.pest_noticed, SUM(ptd.pest_count) DESC
